text: when I try to implement my_custom_training from the documentation I get an error "Params" not defined when I use ps = Params(ps), how can I solve that?

elements.text: when I try to implement my_custom_training from the documentation I get an error "Params" not defined when I use ps = Params(ps), how can I solve that?

text: `Params` is not exported by default, you have to import it youself or call it using `Flux.Params` .
